trans-unit.source: Defines properties that enables sorting, grouping, and filtering on a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"></xref> in real time.
trans-unit.target: 定義可排序、 分組和篩選內容<xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"></xref>即時。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning filtering data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合檢視是否支援開啟或關閉即時篩選資料。

trans-unit.source: ## Notes for Inheritors Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live filtering itself, or you can delegate live filtering to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: ##繼承者附註您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以實作即時篩選，或您可以委派即時篩選，另一個物件，例如基礎集合。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live filtering, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果您委派即時篩選，<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能不需要控制是否啟用。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必須接受它委派物件的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the CanChangeLiveFiltering property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，將 CanChangeLiveFiltering 屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live filtering on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合檢視支援開啟或關閉; 關閉即時篩選否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning grouping data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合檢視是否支援即時開啟群組資料，開啟或關閉。

trans-unit.source: ## Notes for Inheritors Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live grouping itself, or you can delegate live grouping to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: ##繼承者附註您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以實作 live 群組本身，或您可以將委派即時的群組，另一個物件，例如基礎集合。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live grouping, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果您委派即時分組，<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能不需要控制是否啟用。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必須接受它委派物件的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the CanChangeLiveGrouping property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，將 CanChangeLiveGrouping 屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live grouping on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合檢視支援開啟即時群組開啟或關閉。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning sorting data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合檢視是否支援開啟或關閉即時排序資料。

trans-unit.source: ## Notes for Inheritors Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live sorting itself, or you can delegate live sorting to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: ##繼承者附註您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以實作 live 排序本身，或您可以委派即時排序另一個物件，例如基礎集合。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live sorting, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果您委派即時排序、<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能不需要控制是否啟用。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必須接受它委派物件的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the CanChangeLiveSorting property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，將 CanChangeLiveSorting 屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live sorting on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合檢視支援開啟或關閉; 開啟即時排序否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether filtering data in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用篩選即時資料。

trans-unit.source: ## Notes for Inheritors Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live filtering itself, or you can delegate live filtering to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: ##繼承者附註您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以實作即時篩選，或您可以委派即時篩選，另一個物件，例如基礎集合。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live filtering, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果您委派即時篩選，<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能不需要控制是否啟用。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必須接受它委派物件的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> knows whether the delegate object supports live filtering, set the IsLiveFiltering property to the known value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>知道是否支援即時的委派物件篩選 IsLiveFiltering 將屬性設定為已知的值。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, set IsLiveFiltering to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，若要設定 IsLiveFiltering `null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if filtering data in real time is enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if live filtering is not enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live filtering.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用篩選即時資料。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果未啟用即時篩選;<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果無法判別集合檢視是否實作即時篩選。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grouping data in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用群組中即時的資料。

trans-unit.source: ## Notes for Inheritors Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live grouping itself, or you can delegate live grouping to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: ##繼承者附註您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以實作 live 群組本身，或您可以將委派即時的群組，另一個物件，例如基礎集合。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live grouping, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果您委派即時分組，<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能不需要控制是否啟用。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必須接受它委派物件的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> knows whether the delegate object supports live grouping, set the IsLiveGrouping property to the known value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>知道是否支援即時的委派物件分組 IsLiveGrouping 將屬性設定為已知的值。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, set IsLiveGrouping to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，若要設定 IsLiveGrouping `null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if grouping data in real time is enable; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if live grouping is not enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live grouping.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果群組即時資料將會，啟用。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果未啟用即時的群組。<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果無法判別集合檢視是否實作即時的群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether sorting in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用即時排序。

trans-unit.source: ## Notes for Inheritors Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live sorting itself, or you can delegate live sorting to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: ##繼承者附註您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以實作 live 排序本身，或您可以委派即時排序另一個物件，例如基礎集合。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live sorting, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果您委派即時排序、<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能不需要控制是否啟用。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必須接受它委派物件的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> knows whether the delegate object supports live sorting, set the IsLiveSorting property to the known value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>知道是否支援即時的委派物件排序，IsLiveSorting 將屬性設定為已知的值。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, set IsLiveSorting to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，若要設定 IsLiveSorting `null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sorting data in real time is enable; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if live sorting is not enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live sorting.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果即時資料的排序已啟用。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果未啟用即時排序;<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果無法判別集合檢視是否實作即時排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in filtering data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，其中指定篩選即時資料中加入的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in filtering data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性參與在篩選中即時資料的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in grouping data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定屬性參與群組即時資料中的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in grouping data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性參與群組即時資料中的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in sorting data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定屬性參與排序即時資料的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in sorting data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性參與排序即時資料的字串集合。
